trends: There has been one other sighting in King Ferry
There were no other sightings in King Ferry on or around July 4th 2010
divs: sighting details1. outside on deck star gazing\satellite gazing. 10:25 pm edt. 2. was observing a satellite moving over head and the orange object caught my eye. it was to the south and well above the horizon when i saw it. 3. immediate reaction was uncertainty, but the more i watched the more i thought it was a rocket launch from somewhere along the east coast. 4. the object glowed bright orange for several minutes, moving slightly to the east. when the orange glow ended, the object remained briefly visible as a satellite type object. 5. my actions were to continue to watch it until it was no longer visible. several other people saw it as well. 6. the object became dimmer and faded from view.
